statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: Robert Morris 68, Morgan State 49
article.story: COLUMBUS, Ohio (AP) -- Maurice Carter scored 22 points and had key baskets in three runs to lead Robert Morris to a 68-49 win over Morgan State on Monday night in the first round of the Guardians Classic. The Colonials (1-0) advance to play Ohio State in the second round on Tuesday night at Value City Arena. The Buckeyes beat Towson 74-53 in a first round game Monday night. Joseph Ison added 14 points and Chaz McCrommon had 10 for the Colonials. Timothy Mathis led Morgan State (0-1) with 11 points. Down 14-11 midway through the first half, Robert Morris went on a 10-0 run with Carter and McCrommon each scoring four points and Ison adding two free throws. After the Bears pulled to 24-20, the Colonials again scored 10 in a row to close the half with Carter capping the surge with a 3-pointer with 5 seconds remaining. Morgan State cut the lead to a point on Alfonso Evans' layup with 15:20 left, but Carter hit a 3-pointer, Derek Coleman had a 3-pointer and two free throws and Ison made a pair of foul shots to push the lead to 46-35 with 12:28 left. The lead never dropped below double figures again.
